name: The Evil Wizard's Hex
description:
Note: If the WebGL version doesn't play, please download the game below! (Link at the bottom of the page)

Controls:

  • Move - Left click character and select tile
  • Attack - Select skill from skill bar and select tile
  • End Turn -  Select hour glass button at bottom of screen

This is my submission for the 2021 game jam "BenBonk Game Jam #3"

An evil wizard is planning on taking over the world and has cast an evil hex on you. You are trapped in two dimensions at once and must find a way to stop him.

Move around on a hex grid and make strategic decisions including, moving, melee attacking and casting a fireball.

UI skin: "GUI Mega Pack" https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/gui/icons/gui-megapack-101517

Fonts: 1001 Fonts https://www.1001fonts.com/

SFX and Music: Game Music Stingers and UI SFX 2 Pack https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/game-music-stingers-and-ui-...
